content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

No structures have been successfully created yet, as the agent has encountered issues with placing entities such as offshore pumps and boilers.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing offshore pumps
- Ensure that the position selected for placing an offshore pump is suitable. Offshore pumps must be placed adjacent to water tiles. Verify the proximity to water and the orientation before attempting placement.

### Errors when placing boilers
- Confirm that the position for placing a boiler is suitable. Boilers need to be placed on land tiles with enough space around them for connecting to steam engines and water sources. Double-check the terrain and surrounding space before placement attempts.
